languages.text: Со всей возможностей вежливостью Рета отказывается от поставки: потребности колонии уже удовлетворены, вдобавок прямо сейчас у них нечем отплатить за проявленную Вольным Торговцем щедрость. Возможно, через какое-то время реколлигерам вновь понадобится ваша помощь.

As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.
languages.original_text: Со всей возможностей вежливостью Рета отказывается от поставки: потребности колонии уже удовлетворены, вдобавок прямо сейчас у них нечем отплатить за проявленную Вольным Торговцем щедрость. Возможно, через какое-то время реколлигерам вновь понадобится ваша помощь.

traits.locale_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity with. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity with. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

languages.text: 蕾塔尽可能礼貌地拒绝了这批货物。殖民地的需求目前已经得到了满足，而且他们手上已经没有其他资源可以报答行商浪人的慷慨。或许这些回收专员日后还会再次需要你的帮助。
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

traits.locale_text: 蕾塔尽可能礼貌地拒绝了这批货物。殖民地的需求目前已经得到了满足，而且他们手上已经没有其他资源可以报答行商浪人的慷慨。或许这些回收专员日后还会再次需要你的帮助。

languages.text: できる限り丁重に、レタは荷物の受け取りを断った。コロニーの現在のニーズは満たされていて、ローグトレーダーの厚意へのお返しとなるものは何もない。恐らくレコリガーは、後日再びあなたの援助を必要とするだろう。
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

traits.locale_text: できる限り丁重に、レタは荷物の受け取りを断った。コロニーの現在のニーズは満たされていて、ローグトレーダーの厚意へのお返しとなるものは何もない。恐らくレコリガーは、後日再びあなたの援助を必要とするだろう。

languages.text: Educadamente, Reta rechaza el cargamento. Las necesidades de la colonia están atendidas en este momento y no tienen nada con lo que pagar la generosidad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez los Recolectores necesiten ayuda otra vez más adelante.
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

traits.locale_text: Educadamente, Reta rechaza el cargamento. Las necesidades de la colonia están atendidas en este momento y no tienen nada con lo que pagar la generosidad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez los Recolectores necesiten ayuda otra vez más adelante.

languages.text: Réta refuse la cargaison avec toute la politesse dont elle est capable. Les besoins de la colonie sont satisfaits pour l'instant et ses occupants n'ont tout simplement pas de quoi dédommager {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour sa générosité. Peut-être les récupérateurs auront-ils à nouveau besoin de votre aide ultérieurement ?
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

traits.locale_text: Réta refuse la cargaison avec toute la politesse dont elle est capable. Les besoins de la colonie sont satisfaits pour l'instant et ses occupants n'ont tout simplement pas de quoi dédommager {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour sa générosité. Peut-être les récupérateurs auront-ils à nouveau besoin de votre aide ultérieurement ?

languages.text: Reta lehnt die Lieferung so höflich wie möglich ab – die Kolonie hat aktuell alles, was sie braucht, und verfügt über nichts, um die Großzügigkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu vergüten. Vielleicht benötigen die Recolliger deine Hilfe zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt erneut.
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.

traits.locale_text: Reta lehnt die Lieferung so höflich wie möglich ab – die Kolonie hat aktuell alles, was sie braucht, und verfügt über nichts, um die Großzügigkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu vergüten. Vielleicht benötigen die Recolliger deine Hilfe zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt erneut.

languages.text: Reta, elinden geldiğince kibarca sevkiyatı reddediyor. Koloninin ihtiyaçları hâlihazırda karşılaşnıyor ve Hür Tacir'in cömertliğine karşılık sunabilecekleri bir şey yok. Geri dönüşümcüler belki ileride yardımına ihtiyaç duyabilir.
languages.original_text: As politely as she can, Reta refuses the shipment — the colony's needs are met at present and they simply have nothing with which to repay the Rogue Trader's generosity. Perhaps the recolligers will require your aid again at a later time.
